about_the_game:
A retro-style RPG with modern MMO style combat! Step into a strange and lonely world full of even stranger and lonlier characters as you grow your moxie, discover new ways of being, and maybe even find a new love?

Your path will not be easy. This is a difficult game with obtuse logic governing it. If you're up to the challenge, take your first steps into... GENNIBAR-SIX.

Features


  • A surreal and absurd world to explore
  • Tab-targeted, class-based MMO gameplay
  • Play single player, with your friends, or with people from around the world
  • Endlessly generated wastes
  • Creative itemization from strange merchants
  • Challenging bosses
  • Grappling hooks
  • Cool hats for player customization
  • Fishing
  • Snakes?

name: The Snake Kingdom of Gennibar-Six

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, or any x86_64 CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full OpenGL 3.3 support
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Snake Kingdom of Gennibar-Six is a surreal MMO-styled retro rpg you can play alone or with others as you travel a strange domain to encounter its secrets and slay its bizzare inhabitants.
